name: unmarketable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
that cannot be sold or made attractive to buyers: The houses were in an unmarketable condition because of the issues with subsidence. The scandal in which the actor was involved had made him unmarketable. Compare
marketable
More examplesFewer examplesThe pickers need to remove all the fruit from the trees, even the unmarketable fruit.It was found that a weedkiller had been used on the lawns which does not break down in the composting process, making the compost unmarketable.The band are so strange, reclusive, and undemonstrative that their manager thinks they are almost unmarketable.
